name: Vandal Candle
description:
Candles aren't the best of guests, being a hot topic. Tempers will flare in this accidental arson action adventure. Better take what you can before you leave - or before things get too heated...

CONTROLS
  • WASD to move.
  • Collect honeycomb to score points. Each honeycomb has a unique identity to prevent players scoring from counterfeit honeycomb.
  • Listen to the music to predict when you're going to drop fire.
  • Fall down holes to get to next floor.
  • Candles melt. Bee careful!
CREDITS
  • Games Programmer: Michael Meredith, AKA "Peace N Bullets"
  • Art, Sound, Music: Callum Burwood, AKA "Farseer"
TOOLS
  • Engine: GameMaker Studio 2
  • Art: InkScape
  • Music: SoundTrap
  • Sound Effects: Audacity

Submitted for The Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2018

THEME: "BURN IT DOWN"

ACHIEVEMENTS:
BLOCKCHAIN, BUTTERSMOOTH TOOLS, MOZART, TANGO
